item.title: AI systems could 'turn against humans': Tech pioneer Yoshua Bengio warns of artificial intelligence risks
item.description: There is a "fringe" who might be happy to see humanity replaced by machines according to tech pioneer Yoshua Bengio.

item.title: Sen. Bob Casey concedes Pennsylvania Senate race to Republican Dave McCormick
item.description: The slim margins of the race triggered an automatic recount, with results expected to be released next Wednesday.

item.title: Trump announces Pam Bondi as new attorney general pick hours after Matt Gaetz withdraws
item.description: Bondi previously served as Floridaâ€™s attorney general.

item.title: Intuit shares drop as quarterly forecast misses estimates due to delayed revenue
item.description: While Intuit reiterated its full-year view, the company said promotional changes in the current quarter will have implications for revenue timing.

item.title: Snowflake rockets 32%, its best day ever, after earnings beat
item.description: Snowflake reported better-than-expected results on the top and bottom lines.
